summary: The diff implements all five requirements comprehensively. REQ-1 through REQ-5 are all addressed with proper components, theming, and functionality. All 9+ portfolio images are referenced from the correct static asset path. The implementation also includes a few extra features beyond the spec (lightbox navigation arrows, category filter, stats bar, footer, mobile hamburger menu) which were not requested but are reasonable enhancements. No required features appear to be missing.

hallucinated_features.description: Lightbox includes previous/next navigation arrows and keyboard arrow-key navigation between images, going beyond a simple close button
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 only specifies a full-screen lightbox with a close button and Escape key to close. Navigation between images was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Portfolio section includes a category filter bar (All, Portrait, Landscape, Wedding, Urban, Street) that filters displayed images
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 only requests a responsive masonry/grid gallery with lightbox functionality. No filtering/categorization feature was specified.

hallucinated_features.description: About section includes a statistics bar (Years Experience, Sessions Completed, Awards Won)
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-4 specifies portrait, biography, specialty tags, and contact/social links. Statistics were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: A full site Footer component with brand, navigation links, contact info, social icons, and caffeine.ai attribution
hallucinated_features.reason: No footer was mentioned in any of the requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Mobile hamburger menu for responsive navigation
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 specifies a fixed top navigation bar with anchor links but does not mention a mobile menu or hamburger toggle.

hallucinated_features.description: InternetIdentityProvider and useActor/useInternetIdentity hooks included in the project, wrapping the entire app in authentication context
hallucinated_features.reason: User authentication or login functionality is explicitly listed as a non-goal in the build request.
